text:
The include path for solaris is incomplete for the mod_jk modules. Either
that or there should be a seperate ant target for native2.

   George

creator: George.Lindholm@ubc.ca
text:
Created attachment 11458
add Solaris jre include directory for mod_jk compile

Patch applied as suggested -- thank you.  I'm not sure that's enough to build 
it on Solaris, but I am sure that someone will let me know if things are 
missing ;)
